preface.title: Foreword
preface.para: ELinks is lacking proper documentation. For a long time the only real documentation available besides the man pages has been the now old Links User Reference Manual written by Cliff Cunnington (cliff@users.sf.net). This document an attempt at providing a manual for ELinks users. You will find some of it is derived from the before mentioned Links manual. Thanks to Cliff for the work he has made available.
This is version &version; of the book. It is a work in progress. Contributions are very welcome. Please consider to contribute if you see something missing. See how to contribute below.
The ELinks book is available in the following formats:
There can exist different versions of the book. But the the newest version will always be available at the book's page at the ELinks homepage.
This book is written by ELinks users that wants to help other users. If you want to help us make the best ELinks book possible your contribution will be very welcome.

Any help is useful; from people providing chapters of various features to people fixing bad grammar or typos. If you have suggestions for a new chapter or how to improve an existing one we would be happy to hear from you.
Further info about how to contribute can be found on the manuals homepage: http://elinks.or.cz/documentation/manual.
